The paragraph mentions "median progression-free survivals (PFSs)" which is the measure of time during which a patient's disease does not progress after starting treatment. It is not explicitly stated that it refers to a chemical entity, but it is often used in the context of pharmacological interventions and clinical trials, making it a valid chemical entity in this context.
